author: gstein
msg: I got really tired of the fact that a link to our public records was
nowhere to be found on our site(!). Adding it to the front page seems
[ note: I continue to refuse to install a JVM on my boxen, and our
reliance on it is a serious damper on the ability to update our site
(perl or python-based tools would have had a much better hope of
widespread availability). even worse, daedelus or icarus or whatever
don't provide the necessary tools for our members. thus, I leave it
to somebody else can update the .html files and publish to the web ]
